sig_info: Death Spores on the opponent deal 8.63 to 69.67 damage per second. This damage scales with Base Attack only.
Omega Red’s Basic Tentacle Hits have a 9.95 to 30% chance to be Unblockable.

PASSIVE: Omega Red’s mutant physiology renders him immune to the effects of Poisons and reduces the damage of Bleeds by 90%.
When striking with Tentacle Hits, reduce the damage of the Opponent's Passive Degeneration and Direct Damage effects by 100% for 0.20 second(s).
DEATH FACTOR: While near the opponent, Omega Red inflicts 1 Death Spore every 0.5 second(s) up to a maximum of 10. Once the opponent is out of range they lose 1 Death Spore every 0.15 second(s), unless they are suffering from a Degeneration Debuff. Death Spores are not affected by Ability Accuracy reduction.
Each Death Spore lowers the opponent’s Armor Rating by 84.21 and reduces their chance to Purify Debuffs by 10%.
Death Spores struggle to effect mechanical components and are inflicted 4 times slower against Robots.
DEATH FIELD: While Omega Red is suffering a Bleed Debuff or Passive, he emits the Death Field.

The Death Field causes Death Spores on nearby opponents to Passively Degenerate them, dealing 3.13 damage per second for each Death Spore on them. The Death Field is not affected by Ability Accuracy reduction and its damage scales with Base Attack only.
While the Death Field is active, the limit for Death Spores on the opponent increases to 30.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Inflicts a Degeneration Debuff for 7 second(s), dealing 13.05 damage for each Death Spore on the opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Removes all Death Spores from the opponent to inflict Life Steal, Stealing 7.05 Health from the opponent for each Death Spore removed by this attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Omega Red emits the Death Field for 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Removes all Death Spores from the opponent to inflict Essence Steal for 3 second(s), Passively Stealing both 12.18 Health and 3.30% of Current Power from the opponent for each Death Spore removed by this attack.

HEAVY ATTACKS: Inflicts a Degeneration Debuff for 7 second(s), dealing 270.75 damage for each Death Spore on the opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Removes all Death Spores from the opponent to inflict Life Steal, Stealing 146.21 Health from the opponent for each Death Spore removed by this attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Omega Red emits the Death Field for 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Removes all Death Spores from the opponent to inflict Essence Steal for 3 second(s), Passively Stealing both 252.7 Health and 3.30% of Current Power from the opponent for each Death Spore removed by this attack.

sig_info: Death Spores on the opponent deal 242.53 to 1949.6 damage per second. This damage scales with Base Attack only.
Omega Red’s Basic Tentacle Hits have a 10 to 30% chance to be Unblockable.

PASSIVE: Omega Red’s mutant physiology renders him immune to the effects of Poisons and reduces the damage of Bleeds by 90%.
When striking with Tentacle Hits, reduce the damage of the Opponent's Passive Degeneration and Direct Damage effects by 100% for 0.20 second(s).
DEATH FACTOR: While near the opponent, Omega Red inflicts 1 Death Spore every 0.5 second(s) up to a maximum of 10. Once the opponent is out of range they lose 1 Death Spore every 0.15 second(s), unless they are suffering from a Degeneration Debuff. Death Spores are not affected by Ability Accuracy reduction.
Each Death Spore lowers the opponent’s Armor Rating by 110.53 and reduces their chance to Purify Debuffs by 10%.
Death Spores struggle to effect mechanical components and are inflicted 4 times slower against Robots.
DEATH FIELD: While Omega Red is suffering a Bleed Debuff or Passive, he emits the Death Field.
